meanings.definition: Extremely low in temperature or level.
meanings.sent1: The ultralow freezer kept the ice cream frozen solid.
meanings.sent2: The ultralow temperature made everyone shiver.
meanings.sent3: I tried to warm up the ultralow room by wearing three sweaters!
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as ultralow as the icy wind on a winter night.
meanings.sent5: The ultralow setting on the air conditioner turned the room into a freezer.

meanings.definition: Below the usual or normal level.
meanings.sent1: The ultralow prices at the store attracted many customers.
meanings.sent2: His ultralow grades in math surprised his parents.
meanings.sent3: The ultralow water level in the lake revealed hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: Her spirits sank to an ultralow point after the bad news.
meanings.sent5: The ultralow attendance at the event was disappointing to the organizers.
